actions.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Gosar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following:    SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to deliver a printed copy of the Budget of the United States Government; Analytical Perspectives, Budget of the United States Government; or the Appendix, Budget of the United States Government, to the office of any Member of the House of Representatives (including a Delegate or Resident Commissioner to the Congress).
purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 114-611 to prohibit any funds for delivering printed copies of the President's Budget to the office of any Member of the House of Representatives.
